row.name: XBRLDocumentFilename
row.documentation: Unique filename or other identifier for the instance document.

row.label: XBRL document information [heading]
row.name: XBRLDocumentInformationHeading
row.documentation: Heading for information related to XBRL version of business report and its creation

row.label: XBRL document last edit date
row.name: XBRLDocumentLastEditDate
row.documentation: Day on which document was last changed.

row.label: XBRL document name or description
row.name: XBRLDocumentNameOrDescription
row.documentation: Title for the instance document being created. This may also effectively describe its contents.

row.label: XBRL document revision history [grouping]
row.name: XBRLDocumentRevisionHistoryGrouping
row.documentation: Groups information on the history of revisions to the document. May be used multiple times for multiple revisions.

row.label: XBRL document version number
row.name: XBRLDocumentVersionNumber
row.documentation: Version number of the instance document.

row.label: Year in which assets were valued
row.name: YearInWhichAssetsWereValued
row.documentation: Use dimensions to distinguish different classes of intangible asset.
